BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to civil penalties for failure to maintain landmark or historic district improvements.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing civil penalties for neglect of a landmark site or a site within a historic district.

Items.Title: The submission of a site plan by the New York City School Construction Authority, pursuant to ยง1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law, for a school, Midwood High School Science Annex, generally located at Bedford Avenue between Glenwood and Campus Roads, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no.45  (Non-ULURP no. 20025252 SCK)
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Midwood High School Science Annex, Brooklyn (20025252SCK)

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Subcommittee
